Methods in cm.model that return Effect
 Effect Encounter.getActiveEffect(java.lang.Integer effectID)
          Returns the active effect with the provided effect ID.
 

Methods in cm.model that return types with arguments of type Effect
 java.util.ArrayList<Effect> Encounter.getEffectsByTarget(java.lang.String targetHandle)
          Returns a list of active Effects on the given target.
 java.util.ArrayList<Effect> Encounter.getEffectsUniqueHistoryBySource(java.lang.String sourceHandle)
          Returns a list of unique Effects by the source.
 

Methods in cm.model with parameters of type Effect
 void Encounter.effectAdd(Effect eff)
          Adds the provided effect to the encounter.
 void Encounter.effectChange(Effect eff)
          Updates effect duration when an effect has changed.

Constructors in cm.view with parameters of type Effect
